room_title: Escape room "Derby Heist" by Breakout Games - Lexington in Lexington
review: This was fun! This was our first adventure, we chose the derby heist. This seemed fitting since the Belmont races were going on. We didn't break out in time but were pretty close. We had 2 out of the 3 items needed. Staff was very friendly and the place was clean. Highly recommended for a small group outing.

room_title: Escape room "Derby Heist" by Breakout Games - Lexington in Lexington
review: My group tried the derby heist room and our seven participants were able to help figure out the mystery's and the clues in the room.  No spoilers here, but the room contains multiple surprises and gave us all a challenge. Using local references in the game made it even more fun. Breakout games employee Thomas, helped us a couple of times when we got stuck. What a great staff and a good place to test your wits. You need to give them a try.

room_title: Escape room "Derby Heist" by Breakout Games - Lexington in Lexington
review: This was our second time here and thoroughly enjoyed it. My wife and I tried their newest room Mystery Mansion and and Derby Heist. The puzzles were challenging while the game masters still made it fun. Will be back again.

room_title: Escape room "Derby Heist" by Breakout Games - Lexington in Lexington
review: This has been worth every dollar spent! Every time I do one of the puzzle games, I get even more excited to do more of them! My only complaint is that they don't have 10 more already!

room_title: Escape room "Derby Heist" by Breakout Games - Lexington in Lexington
review: My office played the Derby Heist for our holiday celebration. We had a great time bonding and the best part was we broke out with 2 minutes left!
